newsitem.title: USA: Titan promotes Michael Grandstaff to CFO.
newsitem.headline: Titan promotes Michael Grandstaff to CFO.

text.p: Titan Holdings Inc said Monday it promoted Michael Grandstaff to chief financial officer and treasurer.
Grandstaff succeeds Michael Bodayle who will resign his position at Titan to form a company involved in the acquisition and development of automobile insurance agencies, a statement from Titan said.
Grandstaff has served as chief financial officer of Titan Insurance Company, formerly Imperial Midwest Insurance Company, since it was acquired by Titan in 1992, the statement said.
